title: Patch Notes
content: ng animations for Lord Shattershield's Bodyguard. Fixed a Perception check that could let you spot a key inside Crimson Draughts through the roof. Fixed a bug blocking off a dialogue option in Halsin's epilogue dialogue about him being modest about his achievements. Fixed a bug preventing overhead dialogues from playing when throwing Boo.
